item.title: By: Erik
item.dc:creator: Erik
item.description: Ooh! I like how the UNION ALL SELECT literal values table can be replaced with the more succinct VALUES syntax, which (surprisingly) can still use an outer reference.
item.content:encoded: Ooh! I like how the UNION ALL SELECT literal values table can be replaced with the more succinct VALUES syntax, which (surprisingly) can still use an outer reference.
